radiographic_examinations.findings: Improvement in pulmonary edema, now mild; bibasilar atelectasis more pronounced on the left than the right, not significantly changed; no new opacity to suggest pneumonia; no pleural effusion or pneumothorax; calcifications at the aortic arch; moderate cardiomegaly unchanged; no free air below the hemidiaphragms.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The pulmonary edema has improved from previous exam; atelectasis not significantly changed.
